job.title: ONSITE Web Developer - Front End Web Development, HTML5, CSS3
job.description:
If you are a Web Developer with 2+ years of experience, please read on!
We have been around for over 20 years and have gained 3 billion in assets since 2019. We are looking to add team members who are willing to work onsite (essential business).
Currently, we are looking for a Web Developer who is self-motivated and accountable that can also work in a collaborative environment. We offer competitive salaries, bonuses (based on individual performance), PTO, and federal holidays to keep you happy - we ENCOURAGE you to take all PTO to keep refreshed and sharp at work. We work hard and play hard!
What You Will Be Doing
Maintain our current websites, landing pages, and related web properties
Construction of new websites
Front-end design and development
Implement website personalization and A/B testing
Work with custom implementations/connections with external web applications
Website Tag Management
Identify issues/bugs and troubleshoot accordingly
Collaborate with and mentor other web developers
What You Need for this Position
2+ years' front-end web development
HTML5, CSS3 Utilize organized and semantic code structure with emphasis on current standards and best responsive practices
JavaScript working knowledge of Vanilla JS, jQuery and JS frameworks such as Angular, React, or Vue
CMS Knowledge of how to develop custom code for Content Management Systems
ADA Knowledge of and experience developing to the WCAG 2.0 AA level
Exceptional organization with attention to the details while meeting your deadlines
Creation and maintenance of documentation
Familiarity of connecting with CRM systems
Excellent communication skills, and the ability to work independently, and collaborate with team members on a fast-paced project
College degree in related field or equivalent experience
What's In It for You
Competitive Compensation Package
Dental, Medical, and Vision
401K
Bonuses Semi-Annually Based Off Individual Performance
Self Managing - No Micromanagement
Paid Parking
PTO 3 Weeks First Year!
8 Sick Days
Bank Holidays 9-10
So, if you are a Web Developer with experience, please apply today!
Email Your Resume In Word To
Looking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also:
Wendy.Warner@CyberCoders.com
Please do NOT change the email subject line in any way. You must keep the JobID: linkedin : WW2-1641918 -- in the email subject line for your application to be considered.***
Wendy Warner - Associate Manager - CyberCoders
Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.
CyberCoders, Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer
All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.
Your Right to Work
- In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.
